title: JetBrains AI Assistant Reaches General Availability
content: JetBrains AI Assistant becomes generally available with the 2023.3 release, supporting over 20 programming languages across all JetBrains IDEs.
summary: JetBrains AI Assistant becomes generally available with the 2023.3 release, supporting over 20 programming languages across all JetBrains IDEs....

title: Amazon Q Developer Launches in Preview at AWS re:Invent
content: Amazon Web Services unveiled Amazon Q Developer at re:Invent 2023, introducing an AI-powered coding assistant designed to help developers with code generation, debugging, and AWS-specific tasks.
summary: Amazon Web Services unveiled Amazon Q Developer at re:Invent 2023, introducing an AI-powered coding assistant designed to help developers with code generation, debugging, and AWS-specific tasks....
